movie.title: Blades of Blood
movie.writer: Seok-Hwan Choi, Cheol-Hyeon Jo, Sung Hyeon Oh
movie.actors: Jung-min Hwang, Seung-won Cha, Ji-hye Han, Sung-Hyun Baek
movie.plot: During a turbulent time when political upheaval, rebellion, and invasion are coming to a head two swordsmen are caught up in a violent and bloody struggle to seize control of the country ...
